mapper.select: SELECT mrd.*, mb.specifications FROM material_requisition mq LEFT JOIN material_requisition_detail mrd ON mrd.material_requisition_id = mq.id LEFT JOIN material_base mb ON mb.`code` = mrd.materials_code WHERE mq.del_flag = 0 AND mrd.del_flag = 0 AND mq.code = #{code} AND mq.material_requisition_type = #{requisitionType}
